title: Always show panel tabs corrupts Options panel display
author: igor2x
body_snippet: On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3220: 1. File | Options | Tabs & Panels | check "Always show panel tabs". 2. Click on OK button to save and close down Options. 3. File | Options. Empty Options panel is displayed.

comments.author: igor2x
